original_text: He did this to show us today that he is completely right and fair. He accepts people as right with himself if they believe in Jesus. korean_text: 곧 이 때에 자기의 의로우심을 나타내사 자기도 의로우시며 또한 예수 믿는 자를 의롭다 하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: He did this to show us today
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 오늘 우리에게 보여주시기 위해 이것을 하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: that he is completely right and fair
He accepts people as right with himself
if they believe in Jesus
